reviews.sentence: Travel Lodge. The room was clean. The sheets on the bed were rather thin. The mattress pad was very itchy. There were just enough towels to shower and dry off. Overall it was a great stay. The location was excellent for walking to the beach and walking to the surrounding community. Breakfast was in the lobby which was really strange.

Third times a charm. Maybe not. This was my third time staying at this hotel because for the location and price it can not be beat. Staff was friendly as always and I realize that this is NOT a resort or classy establishment. I am only there at night to sleep and am out the rest of the day. However this stay seemed a little less nice than previous encounters. My room was clean yet felt outdated and dingy. It just felt like it needed a remodel or some updating. The other issue I had was with the a c unit. it was unusually humid in my hotel room some to be expected it is the beach after all but no matter how I adjusted the unit it always felt stuffy and uncomfortable. My only other complaint was that I rented a nonsmoking unit and both neighbors on either side of me were also labeled nonsmoking. However there was an ashtray placed in between my room and my neighbors. Well since the a c units are indoor outdoor units someone came out to smoke every half an hour and my a c unit sucked all the smoke directly into my room. I had to deal with this for my entire stay. Tobacco smell smoke every half an hour to an hour. should not there be designated smoking areas AWAY from the NON smoking rooms. At least at the bottom of the stairs or something. I will be back yes but next time I am going to request a room farther away from the ashtray. Price and location.

Great Location. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The facility was close to the beach and good restaurants. Lots of mold in the bathroom. Bad acoustics I could hear the guy snoring in the next room.

midwinter delight. this motel is a gem some rooms still being renovated. We were 4 ladies escaping the Michigan weather not expecting much for the great price. we were pleasantly surprised. Very clean suites with separate sleeping area mini fridge micro area and a spacious living room with flat screen. Flat screen also in the bedroom. Bath room is small but functional with the old time pink tile. All rooms clean and daily maid service kept it that way. Folgers coffee greeted us each day in our room followed by continental breakfast at 7 am in the lobby. We were able to get our ocean walk only 3 blocks away and it was an amazing way to start the day. One day we wanted a hot breakfast and used the next door restaurant with a 60 3 eggs 3 bacon and toast. This motel reminds me of the old but delivers a more modern approach. We were busy travelling and seeing the local sights regrouping here in the evening. It was quiet and pleasant. Kudos to the staff who are more than happy to accommodate special requests. My roomie is diabetic and we needed to pack a snack for the road No Problem. Bagies for the bagel. I needed a rag to wipe my sons car out from the sand No Problem. Heres a rag and a smile. Want to see the penthouse private deck overlooking the pool. No Problem. Heres a key to go inside and view for your next visit. Oh yes we will be back.
Dingy. The room was very small outdated and dingy. We were booked for 4 nights and checked out after 1 night.

Nice Clean and Comfortabr. Nice clean and you had everything a person needs for a comfortable stay. The only concern we had is that when we returned during the day a vacuum was left propping our unit is door open with our possessions easily accessible to strangers and no housekeeping staff was in our unit. They had not finished the cleaning yet. From your card information in the unit I know management is concerned with security and I did not feel comfortable with the room open like that.

Great Ocean Location. We loved how close the property was to the ocean. It took just couple of minutes to walk to the beautiful Windansea Beach. The beds were very comfortable in the overall cleanliness of the room was very good. Based on other properties in the area this one was well priced. The staff was friendly and welcoming. They offered a complimentary continental breakfast consisting of cold cereal and other baked goods with juice and milk available as well. The Su Casa Restaurant next door served awesome Mexican food. The Cafe Vahick next door served a very good breakfast meal. We got in late and after having dinner at the restaurant next door we came back to room and thought we smelled cigarettes. It was clearly marked on all the doors outside that they were all non smoking rooms. We called the front desk and told them about it and he said the person next door was staying for three weeks and that she was a smoker. He offered to move us to another room but by that time was 10 o’clock at night and we are too tired to do so. He told us that they talked to her and told her to stop it. Well the following morning we woke up and there was a strong cigarette smell in our room again. After we got back from breakfast we had trouble getting into our room and contacted the front desk. They came out a few minutes later and helped us into our room. But while were waiting for them the lady next door came out and was very aggressive and saying that she was n’t smoking. But you clearly smell the cigarettes while she had the door open. We complained to the manager and told her we would never stay there again. If it ’s a non smoking hotel why were they allowing her to do so. Just because she was staying there for three weeks was no reason for them to allow her to do so.
Exceptional. Right next door to a great deli as and across the street from a really good Mexican restaurant. Small shower and if you in a large vehicle truck parking is difficult.
Excellent. very very good value. there is also a hot tub and a swimming pool.

I was very disappointed and shocked at the degraded amenities. Closeness to Windansea Beach just across st from Mandarin House. Relatively short walk or bus ride into La Jola village proper. Clerks atdesk OKAs a previous customer many times over I was surprised and shocked at the changeswhich seriously degraded the experience. The room carpet and bed headboard were gone. There were no clothes dressers. There was no separate table for writing a letter andno extra chair to relax in. The parking lot was a disaster. full of furnishings still in theirbig boxes construction debris everywhere etc. Frankly I felt bad for guests who had neverexperienced this Travelodge when it was much better put together. I think you ought to shuthe place down until you are ready to provide an excellent stay for your guests. At 150 per night we guests deserve better.
Nicely remodeled with modern look feel ie large wall mounted tv. Clean room comfortable bed very friendly staff. No fee parking location made it a great value.
Nicely remodeled with modern look feel ie large wall mounted tv. Clean room comfortable bed very friendly staff. No fee parking location made it a great value.

This place exceeded my expectations. It is exactly as it looks a revamped motel. they have done an amazing job at equipping the rooms with every modern comfort super fast and free. WiFi mini fridge microwave safe top quality shampoos soaps hairdryer. it is all here in a super stylish room with an ultra comfy bed. Location is unbeatable a 3minute walk to a super special beach with direct access and an adjacent walking path. Bikes are available too. The pool looked cute although I did not have a chance to use it work trip. The best part. The very friendly accommodating staff. do not hesitate. book The Shoal La Jola it is likely the best overall value in the area.
Perfect for my needs. Bed is very comfortable roomy shower great friendly staff will definitely be back.

For the economical traveler this place is awesome. Do n’t be scared off by the “ motel ” look. all the rooms have a newly renovated modern feel and are super clean. Rooms are supplied with large shampoo conditioner and lotion bottles in the room as well. The location is great 3 minutes from the Windansea beach. Just a short drive to the cove area and dining options. The staff was so friendly and accommodating the free beach towels and chair rentals were helpful. We had a very late flight leaving and were able to pay for only a half day and check out at 7 pm prior to our flight it was a life saver. Love this place. Make sure to check their site for the cheapest rates 99 night in Feb.
Great staff spacious clean rooms very comfortable bed.

This hotel was big and comfy and the restroom inside the hotel room was very bright and pretty ♥ ️ One thing though is that he outside appearance did not fully make up to my expectations. The main photo shows the lobby portion of the hotel so it would be better to keep that in mind.

Our first stay at The Shoal we thought it was a very nice large room. Great shower plenty of hot water. For us The most Comfy beds. The staff was very nice helped us with something we needed to have printed out. We definitely would choose to stay here on our next visit. Close to the beach and great breakfast place right next door. Definitely worth five stars.
